high_descs: Turn right to find a basketball beneath the desk.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Turn left towards the bed, walk to the edge of the bed, and then turn left towards the lamp on your right.
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball next to the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, go straight to the desk.
Take the basketball from under the desk.
Turn left, go to the bed, turn right, go straight, when the desk is to the left turn left, go to straight to the desk.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a basketball near a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and face the end of the white table.
Pick the basketball up from under the table.
Go left to the desk next to the bed.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a basketball in hand.

high_descs: Turn right and walk slightly forward to the basketball on the floor.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Turn left and walk to the front of the lamp on the desk by the wall.
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball by the light of a desk lamp.
